order.instructions: Used to order the offers on the main /offers page. If not used offers will be listed in the order they were added.

url_friendly_name.instructions: Add only the last part of the url. For https://www.frederickhotelnyc.com/offers/room-service-package/ you would only add room-service-package

banner_image.instructions: This is the banner or 'hero' image at the top of the page.

excerpt_image.instructions: This image will go on the /offers page excerpt. If this is blank the banner image will be used.

details_image.instructions: This image will below the the description, above the amenities list.
